Articles.Content:
I am 80% done with my first project, a Holiday themed rocket. One issue I'm having, besides my lack of skills, is when flying the controls are orientated 90 degrees to actual (left is up and right is down). I am fairly certain this is due to creating the parts with the wrong orientation to begin with.

Is there any way to adjust this through a cfg or do I need to do it within a modeling program? My current workaround is to take a stock part and "control from here" which works just fine.

Happy Solstice Season!
This is a post for mod req or add on development since these parts are not released
Sorry, Ill ask there. Delete or move if need be.
